data.title: A List of Android Languages
data.meta_description: A List of Android Languages - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses several programming languages that can be used for Android app development, including Java, Kotlin, C/C++, C#, BASIC, Corona/LUA, and PhoneGap. It provides details on the strengths and weaknesses of each language. The document recommends Java or Kotlin for those wanting to learn proper Android development, and suggests Unity for an easy introduction using C#. It notes that while C/C++ can access more device capabilities, it is more difficult. The best language depends on one's goals and preferences.
